comment: * Contains carrier identification information for the current subscriptions.

variables.name: CONTENT_URI
variables.comment: * The {@code content://} style URI for this provider.

variables.name: AUTHORITY
variables.comment:
* The authority string for the CarrierId Provider
         * @hide

variables.name: CARRIER_NAME
variables.comment:
* A user facing carrier name. * @see TelephonyManager#getSimCarrierIdName() *

Type: TEXT

variables.name: CARRIER_ID
variables.comment:
* A unique carrier id * @see TelephonyManager#getSimCarrierId() *

Type: INTEGER

variables.name: SPECIFIC_CARRIER_ID
variables.comment:
* A fine-grained carrier id.
         * The specific carrier ID would be used for configuration purposes, but apps wishing to
         * know about the carrier itself should use the regular carrier ID returned by
         * {@link TelephonyManager#getSimCarrierId()}.
         *
         * @see TelephonyManager#getSimSpecificCarrierId()
         * This is not a database column, only used to notify content observers for
         * {@link #getSpecificCarrierIdUriForSubscriptionId(int)}

variables.name: SPECIFIC_CARRIER_ID_NAME
variables.comment:
* A user facing carrier name for specific carrier id {@link #SPECIFIC_CARRIER_ID}.
         * @see TelephonyManager#getSimSpecificCarrierIdName()
         * This is not a database column, only used to notify content observers for
         * {@link #getSpecificCarrierIdUriForSubscriptionId(int)}

variables.name: PARENT_CARRIER_ID
variables.comment:
* A unique parent carrier id. The parent-child * relationship can be used to further differentiate a single carrier by different networks, * by prepaid v.s. postpaid. It's an optional field. * A carrier id with a valid parent_carrier_id is considered fine-grained specific carrier * ID, will not be returned as {@link #CARRIER_ID} but {@link #SPECIFIC_CARRIER_ID}. *

Type: INTEGER

* @hide

methods.name: public static Uri getUriForSubscriptionId(int subscriptionId)
methods.comment:
* Generates a content {@link Uri} used to receive updates on carrier identity change * on the given subscriptionId *

* Use this {@link Uri} with a {@link ContentObserver} to be notified of changes to the * carrier identity {@link TelephonyManager#getSimCarrierId()} * while your app is running. You can also use a {@link android.app.job.JobService} * to ensure your app * is notified of changes to the {@link Uri} even when it is not running. * Note, however, that using a {@link android.app.job.JobService} does not guarantee * timely delivery of updates to the {@link Uri}. * * @param subscriptionId the subscriptionId to receive updates on * @return the Uri used to observe carrier identity changes

methods.name: public static Uri getSpecificCarrierIdUriForSubscriptionId(int subscriptionId)
methods.comment:
* Generates a content {@link Uri} used to receive updates on specific carrier identity * change on the given subscriptionId returned by * {@link TelephonyManager#getSimSpecificCarrierId()}. * @see TelephonyManager#ACTION_SUBSCRIPTION_SPECIFIC_CARRIER_IDENTITY_CHANGED *

* Use this {@link Uri} with a {@link ContentObserver} to be notified of changes to the * specific carrier identity {@link TelephonyManager#getSimSpecificCarrierId()} * while your app is running. You can also use a {@link android.app.job.JobService} * to ensure your app * is notified of changes to the {@link Uri} even when it is not running. * Note, however, that using a {@link android.app.job.JobService} does not guarantee timely * delivery of updates to the {@link Uri}. * * @param subscriptionId the subscriptionId to receive updates on * @return the Uri used to observe specific carrier identity changes
